channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s bill cutting $9 billion in funding for public broadcasting and foreign aid gets final OK from House

item.title: How to Be Productive During the Slow Summer Season and Prepare for the Fall Rush
item.description: Summer can provide ample opportunities for reflection, growth, and change.

item.title: OpenAI warns that its new ChatGPT Agent has the ability to aid dangerous bioweapon development
item.description: The tool is designed to automate everyday tasks, but safety researchers found the model could also potentially help novices create biological threats

item.title: Indeed and Glassdoor Just Laid Off 1,300 Employees, Citing AI
item.description: In a letter to the company, Indeed’s CEO talks clearly and directly about job cuts, delivering a great example for other leaders.

item.title: The House Just Passed a Historic Crypto Bill, Delivering a Huge Win to Stablecoin Fans
item.description: The GENIUS Act marks the first comprehensive legislation providing enforceable rules for stablecoins.

item.title: Here’s Why You Should Pause Before Replying to That Email
item.description: Quick replies are often driven by an unconscious need to feel safe, seen, or in control.

item.title: What is chronic venous insufficiency? Trump diagnosis puts the condition in the spotlight

item.title: Colbert canceled by CBS days after his withering criticism of parent company’s Trump settlement
item.description: Colbert told his audience Thursday that he just learned “It's the end of ‘The Late Show’ on CBS. I’m not being replaced. This is all just going away.”

item.title: Why OpenAI’s Advisory Board Is Calling for Continued Nonprofit Oversight
item.description: A recent report emphasizes just how ‘consequential’ the AI tech is that OpenAI has been developing.

item.title: Are office dress codes still a thing? Gen Z doesn’t think so
item.description: While there is an intention to blend into the workforce, Gen Z also values self-expression. María José Gutierrez Chavez explains more.
